home.introParagraph: A student at the University of São Paulo (USP), driven by technical challenges and a passion for turning ideas into software, always seeking to learn and innovate. Here is a bit of my portfolio and skills.

softwareEngineering.title: Software Engineering
softwareEngineering.description: Design, architecture, testing, and methodologies (with a focus on Agile) to build robust and scalable solutions.

algorithms.title: Development and Algorithms
algorithms.description: Focus on data structures, complexity, and continuous problem-solving related to competitive programming.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Interest in web technologies, modern frameworks, full-stack development, and API implementation.

home.aboutMeParagraph: Curious by nature, with a restless spirit to create, test, and improve. My journey in computer science at USP is complemented by the discipline of the gym, always seeking the next challenge.

header.subtitle: Beyond the code: my interests, certifications, and how to get in touch with me.

gym.title: Gym
gym.description: I practice weight training regularly, focusing on strength and physical well-being.

leetcode.title: LeetCode
leetcode.description: I solve LeetCode exercises to improve my skills in algorithms and programming logic.

soccer.title: Soccer
soccer.description: I enjoy playing and watching soccer, following championships and matches whenever possible.

riot.title: Hackathon Riot Games & b1ld
riot.description: Achieved 3rd place by developing, with my team, an AI Discord bot to engage gaming communities. The solution used Gemini for natural language processing and integration with ChallengerMode APIs for tournament management.

receitaFederal.title: 1st Federal Revenue Hackathon
receitaFederal.description: Received an award at a large-scale event with +2,000 participants and about 400 registered projects, distributed across 6 hubs in Brazil. Our project focused on sustainability and social impact, proposing innovative solutions to real challenges of the Federal Revenue.

Raia.title: Hackathon Raia
Raia.description: We developed the Fake Checker, a browser extension that identifies fake news in real-time. The solution used OpenAI's AI for content analysis and integration with reliable journalistic sources, providing the user with a clear assessment of the veracity of the information.

footer.subtitle: I am always open to new challenges and collaboration opportunities.

header.subtitle: A carefully selected collection of my work and personal projects. Each project represents a challenge overcome and a valuable opportunity for learning and growth.

meuVestibulinho.title: MeuVestibulinho - ETEC Preparation Platform
meuVestibulinho.description: Complete fullstack platform for ETEC and IFSP entrance exam preparation. Developed by technical school alumni, it offers personalized study paths, official practice tests, daily challenges, streak system, progress dashboard, and mini courses. Features authentication, robust database, and a friends system for collaborative studying. 100% free and accessible.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Personal website developed with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It includes animations, responsive design, and SEO optimization. Features a light/dark theme system and optimized performance.

databaseC.title: Database in C
databaseC.description: A database management system implemented in pure C, focused on binary file manipulation. The project demonstrates advanced concepts of data structures, efficient memory allocation, and performance-optimized CRUD operations.

discordBot.title: Discord Bot with Gemini AI
discordBot.description: A Discord bot that uses the Gemini API to generate and display custom messages. This project served as a basis for a solution developed at a USP hackathon, organized by Riot Games, where the team reached the podium.

biblioLinks.title: BiblioLinks | PUSP-SC Link Aggregator
biblioLinks.description: An open-source alternative to Linktree, created to centralize important links for the Library of the USP São Carlos Campus. The project was developed with fundamental web technologies, focusing on simplicity and customization.

carStore.title: Car Store
carStore.description: An academic project of a virtual car store with customer and administrator profiles. Fullstack with authentication, car CRUD, and a shopping cart. Developed with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

beaba.title: CS Basics (Contribution)
beaba.description: Contribution to an open-source educational project that teaches the fundamentals of computer science. The work involved creating content on 'Circuits for Arithmetic Operations', explaining concepts of combinational logic.

FakeChecker.title: Fake Checker (Hackathon Raia)
FakeChecker.description: Browser extension that identifies fake news in real-time. It uses OpenAI's AI for content analysis and integration with reliable journalistic sources, providing the user with a clear assessment of the veracity of the information.

noResults.title: No projects found
noResults.description: We couldn't find any projects matching your search criteria. Try adjusting the filters or search terms.

cta.title: Liked what you saw?
cta.description: These are just a few of my projects. I'm always working on something new and interesting. How about we discuss a possible collaboration?

header.subtitle: My journey, projects, and skills in the world of development.

uspIntern.task1: Maintenance and updates of the institutional WordPress site, focusing on usability and information architecture.
uspIntern.task2: Development of internal web applications with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to improve user experience.
uspIntern.task3: Quantitative analysis of digital performance metrics to extract patterns and support decision-making.

meuVestibulinho.title: MeuVestibulinho - Educational Fullstack Platform
meuVestibulinho.description: Complete platform for ETEC entrance exam preparation with over 1000 active users. Robust system featuring study paths, practice tests, daily challenges, gamification with streaks, and analytical dashboard. Modern architecture with Next.js 14, tRPC for type-safety, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL in production.

discordBot.title: Discord Bot with Gemini AI - USP Hackathon
discordBot.description: Discord bot developed using the Gemini API for intelligent interactions. Winner project (podium) at SEMCOMP/USP Hackathon organized by Riot Games. Demonstrates AI API integration, WebSockets, and advanced bot development features.

databaseC.title: Database System in Pure C
databaseC.description: Complete DBMS implementation in C, demonstrating mastery of advanced data structures, binary file manipulation, efficient memory allocation, and optimized CRUD operations. Project focused on performance and manual resource management.

csDegree.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
csDegree.institution: University of São Paulo (USP) - São Carlos
csDegree.description: Focus on web development, machine learning, computer vision, and software engineering.

footer.cta: Liked what you saw? Let's build something amazing together!
